explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the investigation of the acute pathogenesis of spondyloarthritis/HLA-B27-associated anterior uveitis using Mendelian randomization and single-cell transcriptomic analyses. It does not mention or utilize any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies listed in the keywords. The study is centered on genetic and transcriptomic data analysis rather than machine learning or deep learning approaches.
